Description.p:
A subset of SNOMED-CT intended for use in the UK, a set of codes which represent the things we normally do in daily living including any daily activity we perform for self-care (such as feeding ourselves, bathing, dressing, grooming), work, house work etc)
Any code from the SNOMED CT UK ActivityOfDailyLiving subset with subset original id 5981000000139.
The use of this subset is Advisory as defined in latest version of "NPFIT-ELIBR-AREL-P1R2-0178 Technical Guidance for Implementation of Templated CDA Domains."
